name: WFH Weekly Calendar
description:
For those of us who aren't used to working from home, it can be hard organising your day and your life outside of our regular routines.

The main aim of this calendar is so I can set a clear guide for myself on how to achieve my goals and make the most of my time while stuck in quarantine.

I have included a few examples here as an idea of how this calendar can be used but really, there are no rules, just do whatever helps you. Itâ€™s not supposed to be a strict calendar of activities throughout the day, where you list exact times and plans for breakfast/lunch/dinner. Instead, I plan to just list the things I want to get done at a certain time, particularly setting aside time for leisure, work, and side projects. However, if you find micromanaging your day works for you then go for it! 

Whether you are working from home, or schooling from home, I hope this helps you in some way.

Stay safe and have fun
